name: Crazy Flying Squirrel
description:
Fly above the ground, soar in the clouds and perform somersaults - all this can be done with a furious squirrel flyer. Tear clouds and enjoy the boundless speed of free flight. Collect nuts, because they are needed to survive the cold winter. Avoid birds of prey and do not let them steal your supplies. Different levels of difficulty and fun music. Fulfill your dream of boundless flights! Challenge the sky with a furious squirrel-flyer.

Nice 3D graphics. Funny music. Full immersion in the world of flight. Fly in the sky and fly a flying squirrel with the mouse and arrows on the keyboard, the squirrel can perform cool stunts. Collect nuts and bonuses.
You will be disturbed by birds and stealing your nuts.
